rh:help.rh:title: Add an image to an Office Open document

rh:description.para: This function handles adding an image file to the Zip archive that is an Office Open document file. It handles adding the specified file to the zip file and also updates the relationships. It also inserts the image into the target document at the given node, either as a child or sibling of that node.

rh:arg.para: the Office Open archive which should be an instance of a class derived from OOXMLArchive, e.g. a WordArchive or ExcelArchive.
the name of the image file to be added. At present, we don't deal with images in memory, but we could in the future.
the XML node at which a reference to the image is to be added
